channel.title: Old autofighter, not good, don't use it
channel.description:
Hey everybody, I got some more time to work on my miniMauler AutoFighter. I added the ability to eat food, I made the progress report a lot better, and I cleaned up some redundant code. I haven't tested it too much because I don't have internet on the computer I'm coding it on, but it should work. I would love it if members here would test out some of the functions like eating food, burying bones, and picking up gold because I'm really not too sure if they work solidly enough. I will be working on this a lot in the next few days so now is the time to give me advice. At almost every new procedure the program will write a line (writeLn('meh')) that describes what it is doing. So if your script is having problems, copy paste the lines at the bottom of the Scar Script onto this forum and I will help you out.
Features: (1.00) Fights Multiple Colors Anti Ban (Rotation, Talks, etc...) Randoms (SRL) Eats at low health Runs at low health Buries Bones Picks up GP
Upcoming Features: GUI Pick up any object Range Better Bone Burying Better GP Picker Better Food eater
Well, here it is. Version 1.00.

item.title: Old autofighter, not good, don't use it
item.dc:creator: @minitual minitual
item.description:
@minitual wrote:

This is old anyway, the newest version is 2.14 which should be lying around this forum somewhere. But yeah, it’s not going to get the Sandwich Lady unless you have really fast CPU/Video Card.

Read full topic

item.title: Old autofighter, not good, don't use it
item.dc:creator: @minitual minitual
item.description:
@minitual wrote:

Yes, it is using SRL anti-randoms.
I used to use RSCI but ever since that broke up I had to look for a new include. The good thing is that SRL has most of the procedures and functions (I’m assuming some people from RSCI are working on it?) that RSCI had.
I’m probably going to update this AutoFighter along with my PowerMiner and GuildMiner and then submit them so I can work on SRL.
I’m working on a Anti-Mime random and have some pretty good ideas for it so I’ll post that when I’m finished.
Thanks everybody, remember to post Progress Reports!

Read full topic
